meanings.definition: To rearrange (letters or words) into a different order to form a new word or phrase.
meanings.sent1: She unscrambles the letters to create a new word.
meanings.sent2: He unscrambles the jumbled words quickly.
meanings.sent3: The cat unscrambles the yarn, making a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her mind unscrambles the puzzle of life.
meanings.sent5: The chef unscrambles the recipe to perfection.

meanings.sent1: His unscrambles are always neat and organized.
meanings.sent2: The unscrambles of the words were challenging.
meanings.sent3: The unscrambles at the game show were exciting to watch.
meanings.sent4: The unscrambles of the colors in the painting were mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: Her unscrambles of the puzzle pieces were quick and accurate.
